transcript:

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Hmm?
Customer: Woh ek hi hai jisme match kar raha hai.

Customer: Haan woh filter kaise hatana hai woh bataiye na GPS ka inquiry. Haan main bata rahi hu, main bata rahi hu. Jaise aap by leads pe gaiye.

Customer: Haan pan India karte hai.
Executive: Thik hai, pan India pe click, India click kiya aapne? Uske baad yaha pe categories product dekhiye, ek baar click karke dekhiye aapko show ho raha hai ki nahi category ko. Haan ho raha hai.
Executive: Show ho raha hai, bataiye isko kaise karna hai? Click karte rahiye aap. Haan, toh us pe click kijiye.
Executive: Haan isme aapko kiska chahiye bataiye? Jaise aapka hai yaha pe categories mein kya kya show ho raha hai sir? Ek toh dashboard camera hai.
Customer: Dekhiye category mein mujhe show ho raha hai aapka GPS tracker show ho raha hai aur biometric attendance show ho raha hai.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Mere paas phir GPS ka hi matlab inquiry dikh raha hai. Achcha ek ek cheez aur kar sakte hai hum, jaise by leads pe jayenge aapko jis product ka chahiye woh search kar lijiye. Suppose aapko kis product ka chahiye?

Customer: Boom barrier.
Executive: Haan boom barrier aapne jaise search kiya. Maine maine woh search kar liya bilkul. Haan iski ek lead aayi hai abhi aapke paas. Haan abhi single channel loop detector aaya hua hai inquiry.
Executive: Hmm, ab jaise aapne filter hata diye recommend kar diya. Thik hai, ab isme dekhiye niche dekhiye kya yeh manual boom barrier. Yeh toh hai market bhi. Fast lead wala option aapko pata hai jo side mein hai sir, fast lead.
Customer: Kya? Fast lead.
Executive: Fast lead, haan click kijiye us par, by leads mein jaiye, by leads mein aap right hand side mein dekhiye, chota sa circle mein fast lead show ho raha hoga. Haan click kijiye, isme dekhiye. Haan dikh raha hai.

Phir aapka face recognition time attendance system, yeh 30 minute pehle hi aayi hai sir. GST verified hai Kolkata West Bengal ki. Nahi ek. Executive: Haan toh aap products mein jaiye sir. Products mein gaya. Kahin se jo search hota hai na woh option waha se hatana hota hai.
Executive: Achcha, jaise aap products mein jaate hai sir, thik hai. Aap search by name, group aur category specification pehle search kijiye hume kaunsa search karna hai? GPS na?
Customer: Hmm. Haan GPS.
Executive: Kya product hai sir aapka GPS? GPS, isko hatane, matlab yeh leads kam dikhe mere paas. Haan toh isko hum deactivate kar dete hai na jo aapka GPS wala hai phir woh. Deactivate mat kijiye na bahut sara hai. Achcha inactive product. Dekhiye product waha rehna chahiye.
Executive: Achcha category hatani hai. Haan category sirf waha hatana hai jaha mujhe by leads mein jo recent mein dikh raha hai na. Waha se mujhe hatani hai. Kyunki yaha GPS dikh raha hai na GPS, biometric attendance real time attendance, yeh jo GPS yaha hai na category mein upar, woh mujhe hatani hai yaha se, yaha nahi aana chahiye. Achcha main samajh gayi samajh gayi. Jaise jo GPS tracking device hai sir, two wheeler GPS tracker. Thik hai, ab yeh. Haan ab dekhiye sir category mein GPS tracking system likha hai. GPS tracking device, is pe click kijiye.
Customer: First wala dekhiye GPS tracking device likha hua hai na? Haan haan yeh most relevant aa rahe hai isme, thik hai. Haan yeh hatana hai. Ab isko hum hata denge. Kaise hatega? Haan maine usko hata diya. Aap mujhe bata dijiye na mujhe jarurat pade toh hataunga. Haan haan main bata rahi hu, aapko aise samajh mein aa payega phir. Thik hai. Haan bata do. Haan, jaise vehicle GPS tracker hai suppose, thik hai. Uske niche hamari category mein aap gaye vehicle GPS system, thik hai. Ab hum vehicle GPS system pe click karenge, okay. Yaha se jo hamari most relevant category selected hai, us pe hum click karenge aur usko remove kar denge aur phir hum save kar denge. Toh aapki jo category jis pe woh map tha na woh remove ho jayega. Samajh aaya sir? Most relevant mein kar de. Haan usko matlab aap click karenge na toh woh automatically remove ho jayega aur save kar dena aap bas. Achcha samajh gaya. Haan. Is tarah se GPS se aapke kitne product map hai overall? Bahut sare hai. Haan yeh jo jaise aapka ek group hai GPS tracking system. Hmm. Thik hai, toh isme aapka jaise isme pure 11 add hai. Time attendance system hai, interactive flat panel hai. Woh sab sahi hai. School management software woh sab thik hai aapka. Haan GPS hi aapko hatana hai na jo GPS tracking device hai aapka. Thoda sa abhi market do Monday se down hai market aap log ka. Achcha Monday se down hai? Hmm. Kya issue ho raha hai sir? Matlab leads kam aa rahi hai wohi toh bata raha tha leads kam aa rahi hai dheere dheere ho raha hai. Leads kam aa rahi hai. Sir jaise aapki abhi leads kam aa rahi hai. Thik hai? Toh abhi jaise aap MDC service use kar rahe hai right? Toh abhi hamare paas jaise ek aur product hai, ek aur product hai jaise aap. Hai madam uske bare mein mat batao. Sir ek call aa raha hai. summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiry showing more of GPS category.

- Main product inquiries are less on portal.

- Wants to avoid certain categories.



Resolution:

- Executive provided steps to remove GPS category.

- Explained how to mark products as interested.

- Explained how to remove most relevant category.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- category, gps, leads, products, inquiry
